Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- for (int i=0; i < parameters.length; i++) {
+ for (MethodParameter parameter : parameters) {
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over `parameters`, use an enhanced for loop. This avoids the need to manually handle the index and makes the code easier to read.

Instead of checking if an annotation is not null and then assigning true to `requiresMethodValidation`, you can assign the result of the check directly to the boolean. This makes the code more concise.
